title: Dreams of a dying boy
body:
I was just wondering when the new ranked would be coming back online, my little brother Charlie is suffering from terminal cancer and all he wants to do is play his provisional games. Poor little Charlie isn't going to last much longer, he is sitting in his room refreshing the ranked status, crying... the doctors said he didn't have much longer and this may be the miracle that my little Charlie needs. Please Riot, deliver your gracious forgiving hands towards Charlie in his hour of need and grant a boy his final wish.

Singed, 
Dedicated summoner.
